body: Ok so, though the ending was sad at least it was a chad move to keep composed, just tell her "good for you", don't elaborate any further and leave.

Reddit called this revenge NTR and that was a lie 3/10. No matter how much you haven't done it, YOU FUCKING KNOW HER VOICE! This pissed me off because there were so many give aways and that ending was garbage.

The reason i can't and don't like NTR is not because of the NTR itself but how they conclude it everytime. Here, MC recieves dvd and never wonder why someone would send him unless it had to to do anything with him!!! Not even girlfriend wonders that what would this guy would do with the videos he is shooting of me? And MC did nothing after the 1st DVD. He kept on watching it until the last one and all he could muster to say after everything is "Good for you" and that's all.. why would you write that much of a story if you're only going to end it like that? And why would you even wait for the last dvd after finding it out it's her in the first one smh
Ending seems to imply MC leaves her.

Man should have confronted her when he saw the first dvd and then, kick her to the curb

I love NTR story if the MC is tough and can fight back with the villain and finally claim the girl back to the MC...
